sys_script_include.name: UserRoleChecker

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_896e9dbd83e85650e4af6170deaad35f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1521148_borrowno.UserRoleChecker</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>UserRoleChecker</name><script><![CDATA[var UserRoleChecker = Class.create();
UserRoleChecker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  checkRole: function() {
    var sysId = this.getParameter('sys_id');
    var roleName = this.getParameter('role_name');

    var user = new GlideUser(sysId);
    var hasRole = user.hasRole(roleName);

    return hasRole ? 'true' : 'false';
  }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>amine</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-10 14:32:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>896e9dbd83e85650e4af6170deaad35f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserRoleChecker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BorrowNOW" source="x_1521148_borrowno">d400f82383141210e4af6170deaad331</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BorrowNOW">d400f82383141210e4af6170deaad331</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_896e9dbd83e85650e4af6170deaad35f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>amine</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-10 14:38:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
